# RefresheR

## Syntax
Action | Operator | Example
------------- | ------------- | -------------
Create / update a variable | <- | `a <- 10`
Comment | # | `# This is my comment`
Help | ? | `?mean`
Identifier | \` |  `` `1`<-2``
Get a component e.g a data.frame column | $ | `iris$Sepal.Length`
Reference positions within an object | [ ] | iris[ 1 , 1]

## Objects
- Vector
- Matrix
- Array
- List
- data.frame
